question: Question_01_(e)
statement:
Compute the average value of

\[f(x) = \frac1{x}\]

over the interval 1 $\leq$ \emph{x} $\leq$ \emph{e}.
hints:
What is the definition for the average value of a function, $f(x)$, on
an interval, $[a,b]$?

See the related
\href{http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mean\#Mean_of_a_function}{wikipedia
article}. Note that mean and average have the same meaning in this
context.
